mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.data.field

Interface FieldVisibilityHandler<RowType,FieldType>

  • Type Parameters:
    RowType -
    FieldType -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FieldWriter<RowType,FieldType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptorProxyFieldLevelVisibilityHandler, ArrayAdapter, ArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.CalendarArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.DateArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.DoubleArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.FixedSizeObjectArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.FloatArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.GeometryArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.IntArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.LongArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.ShortArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.StringArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.VariableSizeObjectArrayWriter, BasicWriter, BasicWriter.BigDecimalWriter, BasicWriter.BigIntegerWriter, BasicWriter.BooleanWriter, BasicWriter.ByteArrayWriter, BasicWriter.ByteWriter, BasicWriter.CalendarWriter, BasicWriter.DateWriter, BasicWriter.DoubleWriter, BasicWriter.FloatWriter, BasicWriter.GeometryWriter, BasicWriter.IntWriter, BasicWriter.LongWriter, BasicWriter.PrimitiveByteArrayWriter, BasicWriter.PrimitiveDoubleArrayWriter, BasicWriter.PrimitiveFloatArrayWriter, BasicWriter.PrimitiveIntArrayWriter, BasicWriter.PrimitiveLongArrayWriter, BasicWriter.PrimitiveShortArrayWriter, BasicWriter.ShortWriter, BasicWriter.StringWriter, FieldLevelVisibilityHandler, FieldLevelVisibilityWriter, GeometryAdapter, GlobalVisibilityHandler, RasterTileWriter, TimeAdapter, UnconstrainedVisibilityHandler

    public interface FieldVisibilityHandler<RowType,FieldType>
    This class must be implemented to perform per field value visibility decisions. The byte array that is returned will be used directly in the visibility column for Accumulo.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getVisibility(RowType rowValue, ByteArrayId fieldId, FieldType fieldValue)
      Determine visibility on a per field basis.

    • Method Detail

      • getVisibility

        byte[] getVisibility(RowType rowValue,
                   ByteArrayId fieldId,
                   FieldType fieldValue)
        Determine visibility on a per field basis.
        Parameters:
        rowValue - The value for the full row.
        fieldId - The ID of the field for which to determine visibility
        fieldValue - The value of the field to determine visibility
        Returns:
        The visibility for a field
